room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Absolutely incredible experience! Very clever clues and a great staff.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: We completed the Hijacked room and it was so much fun!  Challenging and engaging at the same time.  We escaped with 2 minutes to go.  Definitely looking forward to going back to do the other 2 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Seriously so fun, great team building exercise! Will recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: Highly recommend! Super nice and helpful staff! Very clean and professional. We did the Hostage one - so fun!  Can't wait to try another one of their rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Syracuse in Syracuse
review: The staff were incredibly helpful and nice, and the room I did (Hostage) was very fun and the puzzles were challenging but not impossible. I was impressed by the level of organization given they had only been open for two weeks!
